Capsula Do Tempo

November 2020 - Current

Description

C치psula do tempo is a franchise of self-service totem for recording messages to be delivered in the future, like a time capsule. During an event (ie. wedding, graduation, anniversary) guests access the application through a touchscreen totem machine, record video messages, and then the totem starts to synchronize with the server (through an internet connection) that uploads the videos. On the server-side, the application schedule the videos to be sent in the future.

Responsibilities

  • Fullstack Developer

Tech stack

  • HTML, CSS, Javascript;
  • ReactJS;
  • Electron Framework;
  • NodeJS, Ruby;
  • MongoDB, PostgreSQL.
